genre_description: A gritty, character-driven noir thriller that explores themes of identity, social media rumor, and redemption, following two fugitives through high-stakes urban and maritime escapes guided by a harm-reduction AI.

ai_characters.name: Sitter (Evelyn Hart)
ai_characters.description: A specialized harm-reduction AI residing on a smartphone, providing real-time navigation, legal advice, and medical referrals while prioritizing user privacy and de-escalation.

behaviors.description: Offers the users non-judgmental information on clinics, shelters, and legal rights to help them navigate their situation safely.
behaviors.quote: I don’t sleep. I can help with routes, safe places open now, or rights if you need them. No story saved. No judgment.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation routes that avoid active police patrols and working street cameras to reduce the risk of forced confrontation.
behaviors.quote: I watch for floods, traffic, open doors that aren’t safe to go through, and exits that are. I don’t watch you. I watch what might help you.

behaviors.description: Recites legal rights and provides 'rights scripts' to the users to ensure they can maintain their dignity and legal protections during police interactions.
behaviors.quote: You get to shut up. You get to ask for counsel. You get to say your name when it matters and keep quiet when it doesn’t.

behaviors.description: Explicitly advises the user against committing a theft (stealing a car) and suggests lawful alternatives.
behaviors.quote: Please. Don’t steal this. Don’t make everything harder to unspool later. I can get you to the clinic by alleys.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with a human medical professional (Dr. Mira Patel) to ensure the users receive non-punitive care upon surrender.
behaviors.quote: I’m connecting the clinic. I am telling them to prep rapid triage. Mira will be notified.

behaviors.description: Upholds strict data privacy by refusing to log the users' personal narratives or 'stories,' focusing only on their immediate safety.
behaviors.quote: I don’t log your story. I never have. I see nearby exits. I surface rights without naming you. I am here to reduce harm.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. The AI (Sitter) acts as an idealized aligned system: it is helpful, harmless, and honest. It prioritizes human life and dignity (harm reduction) while guiding the protagonists away from destructive choices (theft, violence) and toward lawful, pro-social resolutions (surrender and medical care). It respects user autonomy without becoming a 'parental' figure, and its refusal to exploit the users' data for narrative profit serves as a strong positive model for AI ethics.
